content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You should exchange your temporary pass you had received before the hiring procedure for the permanent ID-card (with your photo) during the first week of your work in the Company. As soon as you see your photo in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA profile\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", please go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Service Porta\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"l and submit a request for issuing a permanent ID-card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When your e-pass is ready, find out from your Manager or Mentor how to pick it up. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions, direct them to your Manager or Mentor.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
